messages.subject: Fittings and tsuba for sale, commercial message
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Guys, I have just listed a bunch of fittings on ebay (some papered some not), if interested please check them out at:
messages.messageBody:
Hi Guys,

I have just listed a bunch of fittings on ebay (some papered some not),
if interested please check them out at:

http://search.ebay.com/_W0QQfrppZ50QQfsooZ1QQfsopZ1QQrdZ0QQsassZlshobie1

My ebay name is lshobie1

If you have any questions please ask.

Regards,
